snippet: Jamie Hampton will face Sara Errani in the opening match of the United States’ Fed Cup series against Italy on Saturday.
abstract: Jamie Hampton will face Sara Errani in opening match of United States Fed Cup series against Italy; other matchups noted.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Hampton will face Sara Errani in the opening match of the United States’ Fed Cup series against Italy on Saturday.

headline.seo: United States to Face Italy in Fed Cup
